gov.nasa.worldwind.util

Class BasicNamespaceContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.worldwind.util.BasicNamespaceContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NamespaceContext
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WMSNamespaceContext

    public class BasicNamespaceContext
extends Object
implements NamespaceContext
    BasicNamespaceContext provides a mutable implementation of the NamespaceContext interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicNamespaceContext

        public BasicNamespaceContext()
        Sole constructor for BasicNamespaceContext. This configures the following namespaces:
        PrefixURI
        xmlhttp://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace
        xmlnshttp://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/
        xlinkhttp://www.w3.org/1999/xlink

    • Method Detail

      • addNamespace

        public void addNamespace(String prefix,
                String namespaceURI)
        Adds a namepsace binding to this XML namespace context. The specified URI is bound to the specified prefix.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the namespace prefix.
        namespaceURI - the namespace URI.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if either the prefix or the namepsace URI are null.
